DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examined the effect of fetuin A on atherosclerosis and prognosis in hemodialysis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Fetuin A in Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Fetuin A is known to be a potent inhibitor of ectopic calcification in plasma, and the concentration of fetuin A is closely associated with protein nutritional status. The purpose of this study is to examine whether the plasma concentration of fetuin A is associated with atherosclerosis and 5-year prognosis in hemodialysis patients.
DOC.criteria: Hemodialysis for at least 6 months Disabled patients
